code: import React from'react';import{DocumentTextIcon,ExclamationCircleIcon,CheckCircleIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DocumentList=_ref=>{let{documents,onDocumentClick}=_ref;const getStatusIcon=status=>{switch(status){case'COMPLETED':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircleIcon,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-green-500"});case'REJECTED':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExclamationCircleIcon,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-red-500"});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DocumentTextIcon,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-gray-400"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-hidden bg-white shadow sm:rounded-md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{role:"list",className:"divide-y divide-gray-200",children:documents.map(document=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDocumentClick(document),className:"block w-full hover:bg-gray-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center px-4 py-4 sm:px-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex min-w-0 flex-1 items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex-shrink-0",children:getStatusIcon(document.status)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-w-0 flex-1 px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"truncate text-sm font-medium text-indigo-600",children:document.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ml-2 flex flex-shrink-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"inline-flex rounded-full bg-green-100 px-2 text-xs font-semibold leading-5 text-green-800",children:document.type})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-2 flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center text-sm text-gray-500",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Created on",' ',new Date(document.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()]})})})]})]})})})},document.id))})});};export default DocumentList;
